article:
This is a 'list of notable [[Israelis|Israeli]] [[Ashkenazi Jews]]', including
both original immigrants who obtained Israeli citizenship and their Israeli
descendants.

Although traditionally the term "Ashkenazi Jews" was used as an all encompassing
term referring to the Jews descended from the Jewish communities of Europe, due
to the melting pot affect of the Israeli society the term "Ashkenazi Jews"
gradually becomes more vague as many of the Israeli descendants of the Ashkenazi
Jews immigrants gradually adopted the characteristics of the Israeli culture and
as more decedents intermarry with descendants of other Jewish communities.

The list is ordered by category of human endeavor. Persons with significant
contributions in two fields are listed in both of the pertinent categories, to
facilitate easy lookup.
categories: Israeli people by ethnic or national origin|Ashkenazi
